SEARCH
Module webfx.stack.orm.expression
Package dev.webfx.stack.orm.expression.lci

Interface DomainReader<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The expected java class for domain objects.
All Known Subinterfaces:
DomainWriter<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
EntityDomainReader, EntityDomainWriter
public interface DomainReader<T>
Loose coupling interface used by expressions to read data (from domain objects and parameters).
Author:
Bruno Salmon

    • prepareValueBeforeTypeConversion

      Object prepareValueBeforeTypeConversion(Object value, dev.webfx.extras.type.PrimType type)
      Prepare the value just before it will be converted into the specified type. This method is called during expression evaluation, so if the value is actually an instance of a domain object or an identifier, this method can return the primary key instead of the instance itself. This allows to correctly evaluate expressions such as object.id=10 or even object=10 when object.id and object are not numbers whereas the primary key is.
      Parameters:
      value - the value that will be converted
      type - the type into which the value will be converted
      Returns:
      the value to be used for the actual conversion (such as the primary key if applicable or the unchanged value)
